show_only_with_plugins: Show only Mods that have Plugins
add_to_ignore_list: Add Selected Plugin(s) to Ignore List
filter_translation_incomplete: Show Plugins with installed but incomplete Translation
filter_requires_translation: Show Plugins that require a Translation
filter_translation_available: Show Plugins that have a Translation available
filter_no_translation_available: Show Plugins without an available Translation
show_help: Show Help about Plugin Status Colors
help_text: Below is an overview of the various Status a Plugin can have:
translation_installed: Translation for Plugin is already installed in Database
translation_incomplete: Translation for Plugin is already installed but incomplete
requires_translation: Plugin has Strings and requires Translation
translation_available: Translation for Plugin is available at Nexus Mods or in Database
no_translation_available: No Translation for Plugin available at Nexus Mods or in Database
